titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1366) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the alternative minimum tax on individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 10/25/2007--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1366) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the alternative minimum tax on individuals.
